tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE HazardousWasteDisposalRoutes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name VARCHAR(255),
  disposal_method VARCHAR(50),
  disposal_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE HazardousWasteDisposalMethods (
  method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  method_name VARCHAR(255),
  method_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE HazardousWasteDisposalSites (
  site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_name VARCHAR(255),
  site_location VARCHAR(255),
  site_capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE WasteDisposalFacilities (
  facility_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  facility_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  facility_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  contact_person VARCHAR(50),
  contact_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE hazardous_waste_routes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name TEXT,
  start_location TEXT,
  end_location TEXT,
  route_type TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE waste_shipments (
  shipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  shipment_date DATE,
  route_id INT REFERENCES hazardous_waste_routes(route_id),
  method_id INT REFERENCES transport_methods(method_id),
  site_id INT REFERENCES disposal_sites(site_id)
);
